1918670.title: Dulce et Decorum
1918670.description: Just another 2D platformer shooter game with pixel art graphics to boot. You can jump around while blasting your enemies with three different methods of combat, and protect your village from an evil immortal.

1918750.title: Wish Talk
1918750.description: Set on a mysterious magical island, you will befriend toy characters through free-form chatting conversations powered by a cutting-edge deep learning AI. Help your new friends out, and guide them through their journey of growth and discovery!

1918790.title: The Dark Realm
1918790.description: The Dark Realm is a fast-paced action-roguelike with bullet hell elements where you are thrust into a mysterious realm as a cat traveller. Traverse the intense landscapes picking up nifty new trinkets and gradually improving your gear. But stay careful, adventurer, as the Realm doesn't forgive...

1918800.title: Squirrels: Doomed City
1918800.description: Squirrels: doomed city is an exciting RPG set in the city of N, the main inhabitants of which are squirrels.. Explore the open world, go through the plot and unravel what secrets the doomed city holds

1918810.title: Phil

details.Title: Phil
details.Developer: Tom "Charity? More Like Waste Of Money, Am I Right" Schwartz
details.Release Date: Dunno, maybe like, this year? Next year? 2052? Who bloody well knows, eh...

1918810.description: Phil is a 2D roguelike game. Play as an office worker who gets abducted to compete on a saddistic intergalactic TV show, where they're forced to fight their way past a bunch of ridiculous enemies, using a selection of even more ridiclous weapons.

1918830.title: The Time I Have Left
1918830.description: The Time I Have Left is a time-driven escape adventure with RPG elements set in a complex underground facility. A mysterious phenomenon known only as ‘The Miasma’ has marked Aline for certain death. Can you help her escape the desolate halls of Colony 7?

1918890.title: Heaven Keepers
1918890.description: Heaven keepers - Heaven is sending you gifts.. collect them all in this quirky game inspired by classic arcade games from the 80s!

1918910.title: Kandria
1918910.description: Explore a ruined open world of caverns and settlements. Hack and slash your way through missions: patrol, repair, scavenge - choose your quests and dialogue. Or go fishing, forage mushrooms, and race the clock! The old world is gone - the future is up to you.

1919080.title: Farmer's Defence
1919080.description: Farmer’s Defence is a Casual Farming Sim where you take care of growing and selling high quality plants while defending them from the constantly increasing spread of weeds.

1919100.title: Lulu's Temple
1919100.description: Lulu’s Temple is a mysterious action-adventure about an archeologist venturing deep inside a horrifying pyramid with only his torch and gun to protect him.

1919110.title: JAMAL ET MEHDI: The Quest for the iencli

details.Title: JAMAL ET MEHDI: The Quest for the iencli

1919110.description: Jamal and Mehdi: the quest for the iencli, is a turn-based Urban RPG. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!

1919140.title: Antioch: Scarlet Bay
1919140.description: Antioch: Scarlet Bay is an online cooperative narrative adventure. Play as two detectives working together to solve a murder in the shadowy city of Antioch. Wander in a city filled with characters with their own agendas and attitudes, all your decisions change the story and lead to multi endings.

1919150.title: Smudge Coin Run
1919150.description: Smudge Coin Run is a Free to Play Endless Run game based on the Smudge Meme Coin. Collect as many Coins as you can and buy some cool skins for your cute smudge Cat! Try to get to the top of the leaderboard to get some nice gifts and prizes!

1919220.title: Automoji
1919220.description: Automoji is a Auto-Battle, strategy game with Emojis and roguelite elements. Build your team and defeat waves of enemies!

1919230.title: Occulto
1919230.description: Occulto is a indie point and click artistic adventure game set in a fantasy world.

1919270.title: Part of You
1919270.description: Retrieve your misplaced Identity from the Lost and Found at a Clown Convention. Use tools to change the faces of the people of Hacksaw Springs. Encounter a frazzled diner owner, a blueberry loving information broker, an unlicensed orthodontist and more on your way to find your lost self.

1919310.title: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
1919310.description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

1919320.title: Chrysalis Inc.
1919320.description: Slipping between the past and present, a child puzzles their way through a crumbling toy factory filled with the remnants of its child workers and the grudges they bear.

1919350.title: Coral Cove

details.Title: Coral Cove
details.Developer: Sandro Figo, Iris Trummer, Johannes Schatteiner

1919350.description: Coral Cove is a relaxing match 3-like underwater game in which you try to build the largest reef without running out of corals to place.

1919440.title: SPE:X
1919440.description: You are Ilie, an Eastern European Entrepreneur who is starting a new company of building PCs. You love computers and were building them since you were a kid. Now you think it will be a good idea to make your family proud and start your own business with money borrowed from unconventional sources.

1919460.title: Seraph's Last Stand
1919460.description: Create insane builds and break the game in all possible ways to get your name into the leaderboards! Every round you get stronger, but so does the enemies...

1919480.title: Skate Shop Simulator
1919480.description: Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire! Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network.

1919500.title: Pickle Clicker
1919500.description: Click pickle, get pickle, spend pickle, get more pickle

1919530.title: Prototype TD 2
1919530.description: Prototype TD 2 is a rogue-like tower defense game which focuses on replayability, giving the player meaningful decisions and a different experience each game. Design the route that enemies will follow and combine your tower types to adapt to a wide variety of procedurally generated maps.

1919570.title: Charset Crossfire
1919570.description: A retro maze shooting game with a weird and wacky menagerie of enemies.

1919580.title: Charset Crossfire
1919580.description: A retro maze shooting game with a weird and wacky menagerie of enemies.

1919610.title: ARACNIDIUM
1919610.description: Earth has been invaded by android spiders. BOB's family is in danger. Spiders are getting into houses from all sides. Find the right angle and shoot the spiders. Help BOB in this mission.

1919660.title: Zhijiang Town
1919660.description: 你是然比，在架空的小镇上肆无忌惮地和妹子们玩耍（绝对清纯）

1919700.title: No Lights 2
1919700.description: A nightclub bouncer discovers the true meaning of madness in No Lights 2, Surrounded by demons and evil beings, play a man on the brink of insanity, going through various difficulties and discovering more and more about the place and its past

1919720.title: Crimson Dawn
1919720.description: Crimson Dawn is a casual hack & slash RPG. Recruit and train mercenaries and deploy them to regions that have been captured by the evil Crimson Dawn. Carve a path to the Crimson Oracle and put a stop to this madness once and for all!

1919740.title: 奉天白事铺
1919740.description: This is a terrorist decryption adventure game that took place in 1913.

1919750.title: Ponchoman
1919750.description: Kill the creatures and upgrade your weapon to survive as much as you can.

1919770.title: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
1919770.description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

1919800.title: Unlucky Sniper
1919800.description: Unlucky sniper, it's a pixel arcade with a simple, funny story. In this game, you are playing for a bullet, and you should don't hit the target for as long as possible.

1919850.title: Edgar

details.Title: Edgar
details.Publisher: Dark Design Studios Holdings Co. Ltd

1919850.description: A 'poe', steampunk inspired platformer and hack n slash with a poetic story and challenging platforming and stragety based levels with a unique Ghost Phase shift ability! Featuring retro arcade graphics and charming details, this will keep you entertained for hours.

1919910.title: Aoihana
1919910.description: Aoihana is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

1919920.title: 眼球大師 Eyeball Master
1919920.description: Eyeball Master is a Light skit Roguelite + RPG game On the way of the adventure, you must see the most suitable moving route, as well as the matching of skills and passive choices to eliminate obstacles ahead!

1919930.title: Eruption爆发
1919930.description: This is a fantasy based on reality, also a memory and adventure. Unique 3D real style action game to reimagine certain fantastique scenarios in realistic scenes. The emotion is positive feedback. When it hit the critical point, the Eruption is inevitable.

1919960.title: Vulnerable
1919960.description: Embody a displaced therapist in a futuristic refugee camp. Discover the life in the camp and share your everyday life alongside people with heavy pasts. Use logic and your therapeutic skills to solve mysteries threatening both your survival and the camp.

1920010.title: Mad Murder's Mystery Pie Shop
1920010.description: FPS game involving finding ingredients and throwing them in the oven. Then bringing cooked pies to customers of Mad Murders Pie shop.

1920040.title: One By One
1920040.description: One By One is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

1920130.title: Tasty Love
1920130.description: A dating-sim visual novel based on a messenger.

1920160.title: Super Rich
1920160.description: Want to be super rich? just use it on your desktop now, fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds!

1920200.title: Rockstar Life
1920200.description: Rockstar Life is a casual life simulation game. In this game you get to write songs, organize tours, record singles and albums while you deal with the everyday drama of a wannabe Rockstar through random events.

1920210.title: PREDATOR AND WRECK 捕食者と崩壊

details.Title: PREDATOR AND WRECK 捕食者と崩壊

1920210.description: 学生コンテストでユーザー大賞を受賞し、Switchにてリリースされた「ステルスSFホラー」がSteamに登場！進化を続ける未確認生物が徘徊する宇宙ステーション！足音や呻き声を頼りに未確認生物を回避し脱出せよ！Winner of the User Grand Prize in the Student Contest and released on Switch, "Stealth Sci-Fi Horror" is finally here!A space station roamed by evolving, unidentified creatures!

1920220.title: Starchild Velta and loadtosky
1920220.description: Let's go on a journey of training! 2D side-scrolling action adventure of a cute star child!

1920230.title: Venice Master
1920230.description: Become a craftsman in the Renaissance Venice. Develop business after business, be resourceful and creative. Many tasks can be completed only if you construct the most suitable machines first. No need to give it any more thought, just roll up your sleeves and get to work!

1920260.title: SVFI
1920260.description: SVFI𝗕𝗬 𝗦𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗹 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺An app to interpolate your low-fps video or image sequence with AI (make it smoother)Powered by RIFE: A Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation for Video Frame Interpolation Algorithm

1920270.title: Slackline VR
1920270.description: Experience slackline like in real life in this built-for-VR game. Balance over rocks, trees, water, houses and much more. And remember - don't fall down! Can you get across all levels? I warn you, just like in real life, it's not easy.

1920310.title: Dino Island Adventure
1920310.description: Platform and action game set on and island with dinosaurs. Survive the hungry dinosaurs in the dangerous jungle and escape alive from the island.

1920320.title: Parasite
1920320.description: This is a roguelike open-world sandbox survival horror set in a modern city. Play as an --redacted-- parasite, possess human hosts, exploit and evolve them to help you survive in a hostile world, all to find out your one true purpose.

1920390.title: Yummy Girl 2
1920390.description: Sweet buns, ruddy cupcakes, juicy burgers - all these yummy girls love to eat. They are just waiting for you to feed them! ( ˘▽˘)っ♨

1920400.title: Bunny Girl Story
1920400.description: The girl works in the Bunny Club. She loves to sing songs and dance. But she is alone. However one day there is an opportunity to change everything.

1920410.title: The Sargosian Abyss
1920410.description: Adventure awaits in this turn-based tactical roguelike! Explore the randomized depths of a massive dungeon, collect loot, and battle enemies in tactical turn-based combat as you guide your party of four adventurers through the abyss.

1920420.title: SONOHIGURASHI VS. TOUHOU UNIVERSE
1920420.description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The first work in the series. * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

1920440.title: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
1920440.description: Return to the revamped ruins of the BIG TOWER to rescue your PINEAPPLE from the geometric genius, BIG SQUARE! Combining mechanics from previous BIG TOWER TINY SQUARE games, this Tower challenges you to jump, flap, bounce, and ride your way to REVENGE!

1920450.title: Colors! Maze 2
1920450.description: Colors! Maze 2 is a minimalist casual game of easy mazes with relaxing music.

1920460.title: Reset Memory
1920460.description: In Reset Memory, you control Ashley, a girl who had a serious car accident and now has a serious memory problem, every time she sleeps her memory goes back to the day before the accident, Ashley now finds herself in an unknown location and afraid, what will happen to her...

1920510.title: The Elevator Game
1920510.description: The Elevator Game is a simple game with only one purpose: to entertain the Player. Compatible with the Oculus Quest 2.

1920540.title: Dreamin' Her - 僕は、彼女の夢を見る。-

details.Title: Dreamin' Her - 僕は、彼女の夢を見る。-

1920540.description: From the creators of Seven Days and LOST:SMILE, LIFE0 presents their third game: 「Dreamin' Her」. In his dreams, the ideal girlfriend appears taking the form of his childhood friend. Is she really just a dream, or is she something more?

1920550.title: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
1920550.description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

1920580.title: Ramen or Jail
1920580.description: The judge says “it’s Ramen... or Jail.” Not much choice, then. Grab ingredients, serve customers, and pay off your debt to society in this Match 3/Restaurant Management mashup from Weekend Panda Games!

1920590.title: Strongloween: The Escape
1920590.description: Live the adventure of Torkin, prisoner of STRONGLOWEEN. Discover powerful items and fight bosses that will prevent you and other prisoners from escaping. Strongloween holds many secrets, will you discover them all?

1920650.title: Contrablade: Stadium Rush
1920650.description: You'll love it. Good time guaranteed. Let it rip! Control your own Contrablade to knock out your opponent and reach the farthest to unlock new parts, abilities, and upgrades in this unique and addictive physics fighting action roguelite arcade game!

1920660.title: YiYi
1920660.description: You are "GUI", you have come to a city of eternal night, to find your soul to dream of "Yi Yi".

1920700.title: Candle Prick
1920700.description: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles

1920710.title: Codemakers!
1920710.description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

1920730.title: Biggest Stream Hover Racing
1920730.description: Biggest Stream Hover Racing is a Twitch integrated racing game for windows. With up to 500 viewers racing against the streamer using ai controlled hover cars all kinds of mayhem and fun occurs for both you and your fans.

1920760.title: StereoPaint
1920760.description: StereoPaint is a VR 3d sculpting app that uses paint style interactions to create colorful voxelized models in real time. Manipulate virtual material as if it were clay using additive, subtractive or soft matter action.

1920790.title: 生人症候群
1920790.description: Be careful, there are monsters around you

1920810.title: Calmie Dots
1920810.description: Calmie Dots is a new take on the classic puzzle game. Relax, don't rush anywhere and just put all the spheres in the right places to pleasant, relaxing music!

1920820.title: 伏妖绘卷
1920820.description: 唐风还是和风，野史还是仙侠，一款全新画风的仙侠游戏等你来体验。

1920850.title: Air Museum VR
1920850.description: Virtual Reality based Aviation Museum Experience

1920870.title: PROTOZOA
1920870.description: Protect the asteroid mine's reactor from swarms of supersized alien protozoa. This game's groundbreaking AI system uses machine learning to adapt to your strategy in real-time as you build and upgrade your defenses. Fight evolution itself.

1920930.title: 2080 APOCALYPSE
1920930.description: 2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.

1920940.title: Minebot expedition
1920940.description: Minebot expedition - Minebot is going on a new expedition! He won't miss any of the precious minerals wielded by the dangerous robo bees on their way in this offbeat platformer!

1920950.title: Space Voyager
1920950.description: Space voyager is a solo action/puzzle game with simple and effective gameplay. Swipe your way through space, but keep an eye of the fuel gauge !

1921040.title: Wizard of Hunting Life
1921040.description: Wizard of Hunting Life is an action RPG game. Hunt to level up, earn money to buy equipment and challenge stronger enemies.

1921080.title: Galaxy Splitter
1921080.description: Intergalactic combat with the vertical shooter

1921120.title: Emoji Merge - Puzzle Matching
1921120.description: Merge the Cat emojis and clear all the levels! Beautiful merging game with Cat emojis, to test your IQ ;)

1921140.title: Into The Underdusk
1921140.description: Get lost in the Underdusk: a broken world full of danger and mystery. Experience brutal precision-platforming, search for collectibles to expand your powerset and regain your lost memories in an atmospheric 2D pixel art adventure.

1921160.title: TINY ISLANDS
1921160.description: TINY ISLANDS is a low poly Point&Click game where you have to find all the ancient artifacts in beautiful worlds.

1921170.title: Raid Off
1921170.description: Level up your guild in this MMO simulator. Then boss rush with your raiders in this real time strategy with pauses. As a guild leader, did you manage not to get overwhelmed in this fast-paced RTS ?

1921200.title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

details.Title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

1921200.description: A story about a woman who lives alone near the forest.

1921210.title: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
1921210.description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful environment of Tranquil Valley. Find objects without pressure in Zen mode or put your sleuthing skills to the test in Time Attack mode.

1921240.title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
1921240.description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

1921250.title: Splinters of Regret
1921250.description: Splinters of Regret is an atmospheric, action bullet hell where you fight your way through manifestations of your regrets.

1921270.title: Alcohol Empire
1921270.description: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents!

1921340.title: Fallen Legion Revenants
1921340.description: Your choices will decide the fates of many! Manipulate the castle above and lead heroes into battle in the world below in this real-time action RPG!

1921390.title: Build Lands
1921390.description: In Build Lands you will have fun and relax building cute islands, freeing your imagination and building your own cute islands, being able to share in the workshop where the community can download them to have fun assembling them! Relaxing fun for all ages!

1921400.title: Note Brawl
1921400.description: Go head-to-head in a game like soccer, but filled with colorful monsters! Note Brawl is a free-to-play fighting soccer game where you play with a diverse roster Every map and character is completely unique so there will always be something new to find out.

1921410.title: PunjiVR
1921410.description: PunjiVR is an unforgiving tactical shooter set during the Vietnam War, focusing on non-linearity and replayability with realism and historical accuracy in mind. This is not just "another VR shooter" or a tech demo. The jungle wants you dead, will you give in?

1921420.title: Belle Automata
1921420.description: Aureve is content with making tapestries alongside her master--but when he dies, his family sells her off to a reclusive buyer. Thrown into a world of other sentient droids, she must find her place and above all, answer the question: can an android truly feel?

1921430.title: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
1921430.description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

1921470.title: TAGLINE
1921470.description: TAGLINE a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers.Snatch tags off the walls of this funky metropolis to overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

1921500.title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

details.Title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

1921500.description: Cuddle and play with lots of exciting animals, including sleek dolphins and bouncy kangaroos! Earn the animals trust by caring, feeding and petting them. Lot of work to be done in Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under!

1921510.title: Pet Vet 3D Wild Animal Hospital
1921510.description: Be animal doctor to cute baby elephants, frisky zebra foals, adorable lion and leopard cubs and more! Help them get better by examining them and helping them heal.

1921520.title: Apparatus

details.Title: Apparatus
details.Release Date: Hopefully this year lol, probably not Dec10th.

1921520.description: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer

1921530.title: Zombie Death Quota
1921530.description: Help Special Forces operative Della retrieve the Bio-waste containers that are causing the zombie outbreak. Grenade, shotgun, snipe and flame your way through the zombie horde and then evacuate in the helicopter.

1921550.title: Chico and the Magic Orchards
1921550.description: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and find his way home!

1921610.title: Roaming The Stars
1921610.description: A sandbox, space-exploration survival game where you can build bases and explore other planets and moons around the star Craterous.

1921640.title: SquareMan
1921640.description: Reminiscent of Jump King and Celeste. Henry (SquareMan) has fallen off a Cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain Willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in this very punishing 2D Precision Platformer. Beware the Spikes and Slopes.

1921660.title: Six Aspects
1921660.description: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy.

1921670.title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
1921670.description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

1921680.title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

details.Title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

1921680.description: Giant air field hockey played on a fantastic field.

1921760.title: Pocket Academy
1921760.description: Make your dream school in this management simulation game! School got you down?

1921780.title: The Sushi Spinnery
1921780.description: Revolutionize the revolving sushi bar in this fresh new sim!

1921800.title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

details.Title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

1921800.description: A frantic brawler for 1-4 players with a cast of bovine buccaneers and a unique blend of PvP and co-op gameplay: grab the most loot and stab your friends.... but be sure to keep at least one crewmate alive as you battle to become the sole survivor of the Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle!

1921820.title: Cyberpulse
1921820.description: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

1921840.title: Terra Flame
1921840.description: Terra Flame is a side-scrolling shooter. The feature is that you can switch between various weapons.

1921850.title: Lenin Simulator
1921850.description: Lenin Simulator is a political simulator where you run Soviet Russia from 1920 to 1923. You have the potential to radically alter the decisions made and history as a whole.

1921880.title: Max Traffic
1921880.description: Max Traffic is a minimalistic traffic simulator.

1921900.title: The Testing Chamber
1921900.description: For every action, there is a reaction... For every choice, a result... Dive deep into your subconscious as you wander the halls of The Testing Chamber & join hundreds of thousands of other players in one of the biggest & most successful social experiments ever performed.

1921940.title: Hero Ring
1921940.description: "Hero Ring" is a 2D-platformer arena shooter in which you have to destroy the monsters that appear from the portals. Firearms will help you with this!

1921950.title: Conflict 3048
1921950.description: Real-time strategy and tactics on an alien world! Command super space soldiers against an array of alien hordes. Commander - we need you!

1921980.title: Between Horizons
1921980.description: Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. Can you find the culprit before it's too late? Experience an enthralling story set in a semi-open world that branches and ends based on your choices.

1922000.title: Towerland
1922000.description: Fight monsters and creatures in this 2D top down adventure and free the land of Towerland from the threat of Diabot!

1922020.title: Land Above Sea Below
1922020.description: Land Above Sea Below calm landscape-building puzzle game with strategy elements, you have to grow your island’s area and height by placing infinitely available tiles one after one. These procedurally generated tiles ensure that every island you make, every game you play will be different.

1922060.title: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
1922060.description: BrVR Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

1922070.title: The Dream Team
1922070.description: A fanmade game about Mr. Fruit and the Dream Team. A semi-linear turnbased RPG puzzle game where you play as Fruit, Rob, Blue, and Poppy to save reality from permanent sleep. Plenty of references, and a story deep enough to have things to spoil.

1922100.title: RC Death Race: Multiplayer
1922100.description: "RC Death Race" - is a Racing Multiplayer RC Electric Car Combat game. You'll get to drive, shoot and and ram opponents in over 60,000 unique tracks. Destroy your friends in this demented shooting racing game using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag. ;)

1922120.title: Mystery Solitaire. Powerful Alchemist 2
1922120.description: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

1922130.title: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 5
1922130.description: Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

1922140.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats
1922140.description: A new game in the series of 1001 Puzzles. Cute, funny, cozy cats will melt even the coldest hearts! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the cute faces of pets.

1922150.title: 1001 Jigsaw. Wild Animals
1922150.description: Another new addition to the 1001 Puzzle series. Amazing wild animals in their natural habitat! Put the puzzle pieces together and observe the habits.

1922160.title: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
1922160.description: BrVR Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

1922180.title: Package Inspector
1922180.description: Plunge into the dystopian land of Taxien and check packages at the local customs office! Which packages need to be sorted out? Which ones support the rebels and which ones support the state? Which side will you choose? And will you earn enough to pay your useless taxes?

1922200.title: Spoils Of War
1922200.description: Spoils of war - Dirty thieves have made their way into your treasury and are trying to take out all the spoils of war! What does the insatiable spirit of destruction and revenge do in such a case? Treats guests with plasma clots and guards his treasures!

1922210.title: Lucky Villager
1922210.description: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

1922230.title: IT Simulator
1922230.description: IT Simulator is a co-op horror game where two players attempt to return power to an office building. Take the role of the all-seeing Control Room or the stealthy Repair Technician as you risk everything to d̶i̶s̶c̶o̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶r̶u̶t̶h̶ escape.

1922320.title: Stay away from zombies
1922320.description: When you wake up, you find that you are in some unfamiliar gloomy place, reminiscent of an old abandoned basement.

1922340.title: CRASH TEST IDIOT
1922340.description: You must destroy every car in the city.

1922360.title: SCALEPLANET
1922360.description: Somewhere in the third dimension there lives an alien Joe. He can't sit still. He constantly travels and explores the world and galaxies. This time he came across a new planet.

1922530.title: Frontier Fortress - Tower Defense
1922530.description: Frontier Fortress is medieval-themed tower defense game. You are the leader of your nation. In the harsh medieval age you have to defend your land against foreign invaders. Fortify your frontier with defense structures and let none of them pass through your fortress.

1922540.title: The Reflection
1922540.description: The Reflection explores the connection to an alternate dimension that contains all the matter of the world inverted. From the surface, there appears to be simply a reflection of light, but submerging into the water reveals that this world is completely tangible, mirroring the world perfectly.

1922560.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Edition

details.Title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Edition

1922560.description: Ready the Peashooters and prepare for the craziest, funniest shooter in the universe: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2.

1922600.title: Protect Ukraine
1922600.description: This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.

1922650.title: Cosmic Ball Tournament
1922650.description: Cosmic Ball Tournament is a single-player, first-person platforming arcade game where your objective is to quickly get through stages whilst accumulating a high score. Use speed and precision to progress and become the Cosmic Ball Champion!

1922670.title: Banner Of Blood
1922670.description: This medieval fantasy roguelike allows you to lead your troop adventure through randomly generated battlefields. Reinforce the capital against the orcs' invasion.

1922730.title: The Original Wizard
1922730.description: The game is a Dungeon Crawler, where the player must survive the succeeding dungeons and defeat Impeficus on his throne.

1922750.title: xVATrainer
1922750.description: xVATrainer is a UI-based machine learning app used for training TTS voice models using video game voices, for use in xVASynth.

1922770.title: American Catur/Traditional
1922770.description: If “chess is the gymnasium of the mind,” as French scientist and philosopher Blaise Pascal once said, then I say "American Catur is the Full-Distance Ironman Triathlon of the mind" CEO Eric J Curtis. We have two fundamental tactic offensive and defensive bombs controlled with a roll 6 & 8 sided die

1922800.title: Whiskered Away
1922800.description: Whiskered Away is a fun, stress-free 2D platformer starring Gilbert and Skye!

1922840.title: Slopecrashers
1922840.description: Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard combat racer in which a wild crew of animals band together on a world spanning snowboarding tour! Do stunts & combos for extra boost and collect items to protect yourself or attack the competitors! You can ride on your own, or battle it out in local multiplayer!

1922870.title: Shady Business
1922870.description: Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter!

1922880.title: Fun Quest
1922880.description: Fun quest - Relive the old days with this arcade game inspired by genre pioneers like breakout and pong. Clear the playing field from blocks, collect bonuses and try to beat your own record in this game!

1922920.title: Abermore - Original Soundtrack
1922920.description: Estranged instrumentation for the equally estranged city of Abermore. Abermore: A First-Person stealth game where you abscond with ill gotten goods in preparation for the big job: Ruin Theobald's Feast.

1922940.title: Respawn
1922940.description: You're a clone of Kane Hartman. You woke up to take part in an AI driven experiment to find the source of the human will to survive. Fight your way through countless robotic opponents and break free from the maze!

1922990.title: Far Star
1922990.description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

1923050.title: Keylocker | Turn Based Cyberpunk Action
1923050.description: In a silent world where music has been prohibited, B0B0 will serenade her rebellion against the vicious authorities by banding together with the Jukebot drummer, Rocket, to shatter the strings of fate and sing the melody of freedom in this unforgiving Rhythm Turn Based JRPG.

1923060.title: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log4

details.Title: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log4

1923060.description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure

1923070.title: Deadland 4000
1923070.description: A post-apocalyptic roguelike that's easy to learn and hard to master. Scavenge loot, sneak past enemies, and survive by any means necessary in the year 4000

1923080.title: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
1923080.description: A single player story-driven, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's. Use the shadows as a weapon, shoot out lights, blind enemies, and strike from the darkness.

1923170.title: Pizza Synthwave
1923170.description: You’re a parkouring astronaut in a retro-neon dreamlike world hurling trough the vastness of space in order to get the last slice of pizza. Wallrun, jump, climb, use your grappling hook and portals to get the fastest time! For fans of Mirror's Edge, Beat Saber and CS:GO Surfing.

1923180.title: Vitality Girl Ⅲ:Pixel
1923180.description: The game tells the story of a sinful city where a mysterious assassination organization was born. Players play as a trainee assassin in this killer organization. As long as one more task is completed, he can become a full member, but he has also discovered a shocking secret.

1923210.title: The 8 Sins: New Hell Order
1923210.description: Turn-based horror strategy game with RPG elements where the action takes place in hell, player take lead one of 8 demonic races that each of them represents one of 7 Deadly Sins (the 8th sin is Acedia).

1923230.title: Virium
1923230.description: Navigate and explore the twisted organic world with the ability to walk on anything! Climb large creatures, solve puzzles, unlock different forms and abilities, and uncover secrets in this atmospheric Puzzle-Metroidvania.

1923260.title: Aledorn
1923260.description: Spiritual successor to many old school hard-core RPG/Dungeon masterpieces, that combines tactical combat system, exploration in the first person view and intriguing travelling system between main map locations.

1923280.title: Stellarium
1923280.description: Ride around the many galaxies of Stellarium in a hectic vertical bullet hell, facing off all kinds of creatures and dodging giant storms of bullets.

1923290.title: DreamPusher
1923290.description: Easy operation with just a tap! It's a medal pusher game like in an arcade! The maximum number of JP payouts is 99999, which is a threat!

1923360.title: Cards of the Dreaming Dragons
1923360.description: How well do you know your friends? Cards of the Dreaming Dragons is the ultimate tabletop game you can play with your friends and family. Figure out what they are thinking and deceive them to win.

1923380.title: Robot-X
1923380.description: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

1923420.title: Fruit Basket TV
1923420.description: Fruit Basket is the world's premier lethal obstacle course gameshow. Contestants run, jump, and dodge their way to a shot at one million credits, while the timer on their lives ticks down. Join the competition, shoot for the best times, and unlock the most fashionable of hats in order to stay alive.

1923440.title: Weakpoint Delta
1923440.description: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.

1923450.title: Building destruction
1923450.description: Building destruction - an exciting physical game aimed at destroying buildings and various structures.

1923480.title: Battle of the Four Towers
1923480.description: Take command of a tower as you battle 3 others in a game of strategy and wits. Each round, pick up to 3 actions, either attack another tower or defend from another tower. If you manage to attack a tower, then they lose 3 Life Points, but if they defend they lose nothing.

1923500.title: Twilight's Final Judgement
1923500.description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.

1923640.title: RecMaster Pro - Gameplay & Screen Recorder
1923640.description: RecMaster Pro is a super-easy and lightweight gameplay recorder, screen recorder, and audio recorder. It helps record HD/4K videos with the best quality and the smallest file size automatically without complicated settings. The advanced settings are also available and easy with clicks!

1923650.title: Psycho Crab
1923650.description: A 2D physics platformer with an unusual control scheme, Psycho Crab is a game where you will fall down. A lot. Possibly into lava.

1923670.title: Venture Towns
1923670.description: Make your own metropolitan utopia! Stores, mansions, towers--anything goes!

1923680.title: Mega Mall Story
1923680.description: Design a towering mega mall in this mall management simulation game.

1923690.title: Pocket League Story
1923690.description: Train your team to battle to the top in this sensational soccer team simulation!

1923720.title: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
1923720.description: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

1923730.title: Little Ninja
1923730.description: You are a young 8 year old boy named Liam, you recently got a ninja mask for a birthday present! You must protect the house from evil doers! You must be sneaky, and make sure to not get caught!

1923740.title: Sanfu
1923740.description: 2000年，山城市新闻频道的电视画面莫名跳出一则旧广告，而广告的代言人是已经去世的特异功能少年——三眼神童。有传闻三眼神童的亡魂劫持了电视信号。 调查局受命展开调查。随着调查的深入，一个藏在黑暗处的犯罪团伙逐渐浮出水面。

1923770.title: Dimensional Drift
1923770.description: Race through 4 unique dimensions in a ton of different cars with arcade-style driving. Unleash your inner racer as you explore these beautiful worlds. Upgrade your cars, paint them, make them monster trucks. Put on your seat belt, lets do this.

1923780.title: Space Out
1923780.description: Space Out blends elements from Breakout, pinball, and a space shooter to provide a unique, fast-paced, and challenging arcade experience.

1923790.title: Linelith
1923790.description: Solve puzzles embedded in rocks and crystals as you explore a colorful, serene alien asteroid. Discover a few clever twists as you progress in this short and sweet puzzle experience.

1923820.title: Meowtopia: Expedition
1923820.description: “Meowtopia: Expedition” is a cat-themed and heart-warming Match 3 game. Join and experience the urban fairy tale between Xiaoxiao and “Toffee” the cat, dress yourself up with a cat-themed fashion style, and decorate your own cozy home!

1923850.title: Power (of) Metal
1923850.description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

1923860.title: Neon Outlast
1923860.description: This is a Challenging FPS game which you can act as a soldier, who lost in the slum and surrounded by terrorists, all you have to do is breakthrough all the enemies and escape in the limited time.

1923920.title: Base Craft: Desolate Survival
1923920.description: Co-op twin-stick base building survival game.

1923960.title: Unmurk
1923960.description: You only see the outer edges of the puzzle. Put the puzzles back into place to reveal a hidden voxel object.

1923980.title: Varmalis
1923980.description: Old-school psychological horror inspired by Silent Hill series, based on exploration of abandoned places, combat with monsters, puzzles solving and objects and texts to find. Vincent remembers a murder he never witnessed. What if his memories were mixed with those of a real killer?

1923990.title: For Your Information
1923990.description: First person team multiplayer game. On closed map, battle between Guards and Spies. Spies team need to find locked filling cabinet and documents with parts of the password. Guards team need to find Spies, judging on the basis of spy movement or behavior.

1924010.title: Shapebreaker - Tower Defense Deckbuilder
1924010.description: A fusion of tower defense games and roguelike deckbuilders. Use your cards to build towers and to upgrade them in unique ways. Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle. Break the shapes before they break you!

1924020.title: QUIJOTE: Quest for Glory
1924020.description: QUIJOTE: Quest for Glory is a tactical card strategy game based on the work of Miguel de Cervantes. Lead Don Quixote on his heroic journey and experience some of the most familiar episodes of the classic novel published in the 17th century.

1924050.title: Lost In The Space
1924050.description: Lost In The Space combines frantic top-down action with fast, fluid and very addictive gameplay, with instant response to player commands

1924100.title: Word Crystal
1924100.description: A daily word guessing game with four linked words of five letters apiece.

1924260.title: Super Gosu Cars
1924260.description: Arcade racing action mixed with kart racing combat! Up to 8 players in local multiplayer! Lots of different vehicles, drivers and tracks to try out and more yet to unlock! Go for gold in the Grand Prix! Hone your skills in Time Trial! Run wild in Custom Tournaments! - It's Super Gosu Cars time!

1924270.title: Shooting Covid
1924270.description: Years and years after the virus outbreak, humanity has been suffering. Alpha Zen sends their last hope, Bella, to save humankind from the apocalypse. Bella's mission to restore hope and hunting for vaccines is risky and hazardous. She cannot do this on her own. So, she needs the best sidekick, you.

1924310.title: Pixel Pirate
1924310.description: Pxel Pirate - 2D-platformer about pirates, made in pixel art.

1924370.title: Slurpy Derpy
1924370.description: Breed ever-stronger Derps. Use them to Bake, Conquer, Research and Evolve!

1924380.title: Dashing Orange
1924380.description: A 2D precision platformer about a little Orange that can dash and jump around this abstract world to avoid all the traps in the way to reach your goal.

1924390.title: Binary Run
1924390.description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

1924400.title: Hand of Doom
1924400.description: Sign a contract in blood! Travel throughout the planes of existence slaying or befriending powerful doomlords in this wizard simulator inspired by the FMV games and dungeon crawlers of the early 90's. Learn powerful spells to solve puzzles and combat the dark forces amassing against you.

1924430.title: Cookie Cutter
1924430.description: Love turns to rage and chainsaws in Cookie Cutter, a techno-pop-punk 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania set to the backdrop of a bleak and beautiful dying world. Become Cherry, a rage-driven android on a quest to rescue her beloved creator, Doctor Shinji Fallon, from the clutches of a deranged mastermind.

1924440.title: Directly Drink Milk from Cow　【直に牛乳を飲め】

details.Title: Directly Drink Milk from Cow　【直に牛乳を飲め】

1924440.description: The main character comes to work part-time at a ranch and takes care of 16 Holstein cows and their calves. He has to chase the cows with his dog, milk the cows, feed them, and carry the milk in buckets slowly without spilling. You can also take a car to explore and talk to the villagers.

1924460.title: Light The Lamp Hockey
1924460.description: Old School Hockey Gaming in a Beer League coat of paint! Welcome to the most dynamic 8-ish bit hockey experience you could have ever asked for. Built on simplicity and full of depth, Take your team to the playoffs and win the almighty 'Ship!

1924520.title: Cordychosis
1924520.description: A point-and-click adventure game taking place within a single room. Equipped with some trash and a makeshift time machine, and aided by a neurotic version of yourself from 5 years ago, you must traverse time, collect objects, solve puzzles, befriend a large zombie bee, and escape the madness.

1924530.title: Kingdom Two Crowns

details.Title: Kingdom Two Crowns
details.Franchise: Kingdom, Raw Fury, Kingdom Two Crowns

1924530.description: In Kingdom Two Crowns, players must work in the brand-new solo or co-op campaign mode to build their kingdom and secure it from the threat of the Greed. Experience new technology, units, enemies, mounts, and secrets in the next evolution of the award-winning micro strategy franchise!

1924590.title: Sokobalien
1924590.description: Do you have what it takes to build the biggest space farm in the galaxy? Help the alien reach this goal in this classic Sokoban puzzle style game! Push cows, sheep, pigs and chicken so that the correct UFO beams can abduct them. (Also, as a side-quest, collect all the hats you can!)

1924820.title: StudioS Fighters: Climax Champions
1924820.description: An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1! Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos! A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!

1924850.title: 天狼星奇谭 Tales of Sirius

details.Title: 天狼星奇谭 Tales of Sirius

1924850.description: 《天狼星奇谭》是一款像素风格的轻解谜+冒险ARPG。 玩家在游戏中将扮演M市市立中学的普通高中生七叶，因一通神秘的匿名电话而起，由此踏上了寻找自己神秘失踪姐姐的冒险之旅。 在游戏时间为一个假期的游戏流程中，七叶将与自己社团“神研部”的小伙伴们一起穿梭在城市之中，解开谜题，进行战斗，与各方势力周旋，逐渐探寻到事情的真相。 但是，事态真的会像普通的热血冒险故事一样发展吗？

1924910.title: Dr. Chatelet: Faith 神医
1924910.description: Amputations, bloodletting, alchemy - all of which seem unthinkable today - were the treatment options that medieval doctors revered. You must face challenges one after another and experience gains and losses in the course of your constant adventures

1924930.title: Anode Heart
1924930.description: A semi-open world monster tamer RPG, set in a futuristic environment where digital and analog reality have become indistinguishable from one another.

1924960.title: Never Out Of Time
1924960.description: Survive in an ocean of bullets by dodging, shooting at your foes and manipulating time. You can take as much time as you need and even "do over": YOU set the tempo of the action. Will you be able to conquer the space station?

1924970.title: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
1924970.description: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!
